p: Scanning electron microscopy (SEM/EDX) analyses were carried out using a QUANTA 200 scanning electronic microscope (Thermo Fisher Scientific, Waltham, MA, USA) with an integrated (EDX system, (Thermo Fisher Scientific Waltham, Waltham, MA, USA), and a GENESIS XM 2i EDAX with SUTW detector (FEI Company, Eindhoven, The Netherlands).
